bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: EA, Pathological Mechanism of a yin xu huo dong 陰虛火動 , yin depletion with excited fire, resulting from a unilateral insufficiency of yin blood. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ren shen 人參 quotes LYW: 血虛火亢能食，脈弦而數，涼之則傷胃，溫之則傷肺，不受 補者也 , “In the case of blood depletion with excessive fire , when [the patient] is able to eat, and when the [movement in the] vessels is string[-like] and frequent, [treatment with] cold substances will harm his stomach; [treatment with] warming substances will harm his lung. This is a situation where supplementation is not accepted”.
